seo.title: Kayayyakin Sarrafa Kai na Masana'antu da Kayan Aikin Lantarki | Tsarin PLC SCADA, Masu auna firikwensin, Masu watsawa | Powerton Engineering
seo.description: Katalogi mai cike da kayayyakin sarrafa masana'antu, kayan aikin kwamitin sarrafa wutar lantarki, kayan aikin haɗi, tsarin PLC SCADA DCS, masu watsa matsa lamba, masu auna zafin jiki, mitar gudun ruwa, masu auna matakin, masu karya kewaye, masu haɗawa, relays, VFDs, cibiyoyin sarrafa motoci, kayayyakin hasken rana, Motors na , famfunan centrifugal, kayan aikin aunawa, na'urorin tsaro, kayan aikin masana'antu. Mai rarraba izini don Siemens, Allen Bradley, Schneider, ABB, Honeywell, Yokogawa, Endress+Hauser, Rosemount. instrumentation.fullDescription: Cikakken kewayon madaidaicin kayan aikin aunawa don aikace-aikacen sa ido da sarrafa masana'antu.

electrical.fullDescription: Cikakken kewayon kayan aikin lantarki ciki har da sauyawa, relays, contactors, da kayan aikin rarraba wutar lantarki don aikace-aikacen masana'antu.

measurement.fullDescription: Mita na dijital mai ci gaba, masu nazari, da kayan aikin daidaitawa don madaidaicin aunawa da sa ido kan sigogin lantarki da tsari.

solar.fullDescription: Cikakkun hanyoyin samar da makamashin hasken rana ciki har da bangarori, inverters, tsarin sa ido, da kayan aikin grid-tie don samar da makamashi mai dorewa.

specifications.gridOptions: Grid-tie da hanyoyin da ba su da grid

automation.fullDescription: Ci gaban sarrafa kansa da tsarin sarrafawa ciki har da PLCs, HMIs, hanyoyin SCADA, da na'urorin sadarwa na masana'antu.

safety.fullDescription: Kayan aikin tsaro da kariya mai cike da ciki har da masu karya kewayawa, relays na tsaro, tsarin tsayawa na gaggawa, da na'urorin kariya.

pumps.fullDescription: Ingantattun famfunan inji, kayan gyara, da kayan aikin kulawa don aikace-aikacen masana'antu da kasuwanci daban-daban.

specifications.flowRate: Ƙimar gudun ruwa: 10 LPM zuwa 5000 LPM
specifications.head: Kai: 10m zuwa 500m

tools.fullDescription: Kayan aikin masana'antu na ƙwararrun ƙwararru, magance matsaloli, da kayan aikin kulawa don aikace-aikacen injiniya da kulawa daban-daban.

specifications.certifiedStandards: An tabbatar da shi ga ƙa'idodin duniya

siemensSitrans.description: Mai watsa matsa lamba mai hankali tare da babban sadarwa ta dijital

vegaVegapuls.title: VEGA VEGAPULS 64 Mai Watsa Matakin Radar
vegaVegapuls.description: Babban mai watsa matakin radar 80 GHz don madaidaicin auna matakin

rccb-circuit-breakers.title: RCCB Masu Karya Kewayawa
rccb-circuit-breakers.description: Masu Karya Kewayawa na Yanzu (RCCB) don kariyar ɗigar ƙasa. Muhimman na'urorin tsaro waɗanda ke kariya daga girgizar lantarki da haɗarin gobara ta hanyar gano rashin daidaituwa na yanzu.

acb-circuit-breakers.title: ACB Masu Karya Kewayawa
acb-circuit-breakers.description: Masu Karya Kewayawa na Iska (ACB) don rarraba wutar lantarki mai ƙarancin ƙarfi. Masu karya kewayawa masu ƙarfi tare da fasalulluka na kariya mai zurfi don tsarin lantarki na masana'antu da kasuwanci.

vcb-circuit-breakers.title: VCB Masu Karya Kewayawa
vcb-circuit-breakers.description: Masu Karya Kewayawa na Vacuum (VCB) don aikace-aikace masu matsakaicin ƙarfi. Babban fasahar kashe arc wanda ke ba da amintaccen sauyawa da kariya a cikin tashoshin lantarki.

pnpNpnSensors.title: PNP/NPN Masu auna firikwensin
pnpNpnSensors.description: Masu auna kusanci na masana'antu gami da nau'ikan PNP da NPN don aikace-aikacen sarrafa kansa. Waɗannan na'urori masu auna firikwensin suna ba da amintaccen ganowa na abubuwa na ƙarfe ba tare da tuntuɓar jiki ba, suna fasalta ingantaccen gini, manyan mitoci masu sauyawa, kyakkyawan maimaitawa, da juriya ga tsangwama na lantarki don mahalli na masana'antu masu buƙata.

rtdThermocouplesSensors.title: RTD/Thermocouples Masu auna firikwensin
rtdThermocouplesSensors.description: Masu auna zafin jiki gami da Masu gano zafin jiki (RTD) na'urori masu auna firikwensin da thermocouples na masana'antu don madaidaicin ma'aunin zafin jiki a cikin matakai na masana'antu. Masu auna firikwensin RTD suna samuwa a cikin PT100, PT500, da PT1000 configurations, da thermocouples a cikin J, K, T, E, R, S, da N nau'ikan. An ƙera su don duka ma'aunin daidaito da aikace-aikace masu zafi tare da kyakkyawan daidaito, kwanciyar hankali, da karko a cikin matsanancin yanayin masana'antu.

loadCell.title: Masu auna Cell ɗin Load
loadCell.description: Madaidaicin na'urori masu auna cell don aikace-aikacen ƙarfi da auna nauyi. Ana samun su a cikin matsawa, tashin hankali, da kuma daidaitattun siffofi tare da babban daidaito da kyakkyawan kwanciyar hankali na dogon lokaci don tsarin auna nauyi na masana'antu.

phSensors.title: Masu auna pH
phSensors.description: Masu auna pH na masana'antu don sa ido kan ingancin ruwa da aikace-aikacen sarrafa tsari. Zaɓuɓɓukan electrode na gilashi da fasahar ISFET tare da ramawar zafin jiki ta atomatik da ikon sadarwa na dijital na HART.

dpTypeTransmitter.title: Masu watsawa Matsi daban-daban
dpTypeTransmitter.description: Babban madaidaicin masu watsawa matsa lamba daban-daban don aikace-aikacen gudun ruwa, matakin, da auna matsa lamba. Yana fasalta sadarwa ta HART, diyya ta dijital, da ingantaccen gini don mahalli na masana'antu masu buƙata.

pTypeTransmitter.title: Masu watsa Matsi
pTypeTransmitter.description: Masu watsa matsa lamba na masana'antu don cikakken ma'aunin matsa lamba da ma'aunin matsa lamba. Yana fasalta fasahar firikwensin ci gaba, kyakkyawan kwanciyar hankali, da cikakkun iyawar bincike don aikace-aikacen sarrafa kansa.

rsTypeTransmitter.title: Masu watsawa na hatimi mai nisa
rsTypeTransmitter.description: Masu watsa matsa lamba na hatimi mai nisa don aikace-aikacen zafin jiki mai girma, lalata, ko danko mai yawa. Tsarin da aka cika na Capillary yana ba da amintaccen ma'aunin matsa lamba a cikin yanayin tsari mai ƙalubale.

massFlowMeter.title: Mitar Gudun Ruwa Mai Girma
massFlowMeter.description: Coriolis mitoci masu gudun ruwa don auna gudun ruwa kai tsaye da yawa da yawa na ruwa da gas. Madaidaicin ma'auni mai girma ba tare da la'akari da kaddarorin ruwa, zafin jiki, da bambancin matsa lamba.

vortexFlowMeter.title: Mitar Gudun Ruwa ta Vortex
vortexFlowMeter.description: Mitar gudun ruwa ta Vortex don aikace-aikacen tururi, gas, da ruwa. Babu ƙirar sassa masu motsi da ke tabbatar da amintaccen aiki tare da ginanniyar diyya ta zafin jiki da iyawar ma'auni mai yawa.

volumetricFlowMeter.title: Mitar Gudun Ruwa ta Volumetric
volumetricFlowMeter.description: Na'urar electromagnetic, ultrasonic, da kuma tabbatacciyar mitar gudun ruwa don auna gudun ruwa daidai da gas. Siffofin sun haɗa da babu sassa masu motsi (electromagnetic), babban daidaito, ƙaramin digo na matsa lamba, da kyakkyawan kwanciyar hankali na dogon lokaci. Manhaja ce mai kyau don ruwa, ruwan sharar gida, aikace-aikacen kemikal, canja wurin tsaro, da ayyukan tarawa da ke buƙatar amintaccen ma'aunin volumetric.

pdFlowMeter.title: Mitar Gudun Ruwa ta PD
pdFlowMeter.description: Tabbatacciyar mitar gudun ruwa ta amfani da kayan aiki na gwada gudun ruwa, kayan aiki mai helical, diski mai nutating, da ka'idojin auna dunƙule don auna gudun ruwa daidai. Siffofin sun haɗa da babban daidaito, fifikon maimaitawa, da faɗin kewayon danko. Manhaja ce mai kyau don canja wurin tsaro, taro, auna man fetur, sashi na kemikal, da aikace-aikace masu girma da ke buƙatar amintaccen ma'aunin volumetric.

pressureSwitches.title: Sauya Matsi
pressureSwitches.description: Sauya matsa lamba na masana'antu don daidaitaccen sa ido kan matsa lamba da sarrafawa a cikin tsarin sarrafa kansa. Akwai daga manyan masana'antun kamar Danfoss, Schneider Electric, WIKA, da ABB.

levelSwitches.title: Sauya Mataki
levelSwitches.description: Sauya gano matakin-aya ta amfani da cokali mai yatsu, iyo, da fasahohin capacitive. Daga amintattun samfuran kamar Endress + Hauser, ABB, da VEGA don amintaccen ruwa da sa ido kan matakin ƙarfi.

limitSwitches.title: Sauya iyaka
limitSwitches.description: Sauya gano matsayi mai nauyi don sarrafa kansa na masana'antu. Daga Omron, Schneider Electric, da Siemens tare da kariyar IP67 da ingantaccen ginin ƙarfe don amintaccen aiki.

pushButtons.title: Maɓallan Turawa
pushButtons.description: Maɓallan turawa na masana'antu don bangarori masu sarrafawa da injina. Akwai a cikin girman 22mm da 30mm daga Schneider Electric, Eaton, ABB, da Siemens tare da nau'ikan saitin lamba da zaɓuɓɓukan haske.

controlValves.title: Bawuloli masu Sarrafawa
controlValves.description: Bawuloli masu sarrafawa don sarrafa kansa daga Fisher (Emerson), SAMSON, da ABB. Zane-zanen duniya, ball, da rotary tare da masu sanya matsayi na dijital da iyawar sadarwa ta HART.

solenoidValves.title: Solenoid Bawuloli
solenoidValves.description: Bawuloli da ake sarrafa wutar lantarki don sarrafa ruwa. ASCO (Emerson) da Parker Hannifin sun yi ƙira don iska, ruwa, tururi, da nau'ikan ruwa na masana'antu tare da ayyukan da ake sarrafa kai tsaye da matuƙi.

onOffValves.title: Bawuloli masu kunne/kashe
onOffValves.description: Masana'antu masu kunna-kashe ball da bawuloli masu ƙofa don amintaccen sabis na rufewa. Siffofin sun haɗa da aiki da kashi-kwata, aikin hannu ko na pneumatic, ginin bakin karfe, da bin ƙa'idodin API, ANSI, da ISO. Akwai su daga manyan masana'antun da suka haɗa da Emerson Fisher, Flowserve Worcester, Swagelok, da Burkert don keɓance tsari, kashewa na gaggawa, da aikace-aikacen sarrafa gudun ruwa.

liquidAnalyzers.title: Masu Nazarin Ruwa
liquidAnalyzers.description: Cikakkun masu nazarin ruwa don sa ido kan ingancin ruwa, sarrafa tsarin kemikal, da bin muhalli. Bincike mai yawa tare da daidaitawa ta atomatik da iyawar shigar da bayanai.

oxygenGasAnalyzers.title: Masu Nazarin Gas na Oxygen (O2)
oxygenGasAnalyzers.description: Masu nazarin oxygen mai daidaito don sa ido kan tsarin masana'antu da aikace-aikacen aminci. Fasahohin electrochemical, paramagnetic, da na gani daga manyan masana'antun kamar Systech, Panametrics, da Endress+Hauser.

nitrogenGasAnalyzers.title: Masu Nazarin Gas na Nitrogen (N2)
nitrogenGasAnalyzers.description: Masu nazarin gas na nitrogen ta amfani da thermal conductivity da fasahohin haɗakar gas mai aiki. LECO da kayan aikin HORIBA don binciken asali a cikin karafa da gami tare da babban ma'auni mai daidaito.

hydrogenGasAnalyzers.title: Masu Nazarin Gas na Hydrogen (H2)
hydrogenGasAnalyzers.description: Masu nazarin hydrogen tare da gano thermal conductivity don binciken cakuda binary da sa ido kan tsari. Tsarin Nova Analytical da Endress+Hauser don aikace-aikacen aminci da sarrafa inganci.

carbonDioxideGasAnalyzers.title: Masu Nazarin Gas na Carbon Dioxide (CO2)
carbonDioxideGasAnalyzers.description: Masu nazarin CO2 ta amfani da fasahohin NDIR da TDLAS don sarrafa konewa, sarrafa abinci, da sa ido kan muhalli. Kewayon daga ppm zuwa matakan kashi tare da babban ma'auni mai daidaito.

codAnalyzers.title: Masu Nazarin COD
codAnalyzers.description: Masu nazarin buƙatun oxygen na kemikal don gwajin ingancin ruwa da sa ido kan kula da ruwa mai sharar gida. Tsarin Hach, MANTECH, da LAR tare da bincike ta atomatik da iyawar bin ƙa'ida.

bodAnalyzers.title: Masu Nazarin BOD
bodAnalyzers.description: Masu nazarin buƙatun oxygen na Biochemical don auna gurɓataccen abu a cikin samfuran ruwa. Tsarin MANTECH, Hach, da YSI ta atomatik tare da na'urori masu auna DO na gani da sarrafa zafin jiki.

standardCeilingFans.title: Standard Magoya bayan Rufi
standardCeilingFans.description: Magiya bayan rufi na DC marasa goge da ke amfani da makamashi tare da sarrafa saurin gudu da aiki mai shiru. Suna fasalta sabbin ƙira, aikin sarrafa nesa, da tanadin makamashi na musamman idan aka kwatanta da injinan AC na gargajiya.

premiumCeilingFans.title: Magoya bayan Rufi masu ƙima
premiumCeilingFans.description: Magiya bayan rufi na DC marasa goge masu aiki tare da fasalolin ci gaba gami da sarrafa wayo, hasken LED, da fifikon ƙirar aerodynamic. Samfuran ƙima suna ba da ingantaccen karko da aikin shiru.

commercialCeilingFans.title: Magoya bayan Rufi na Kasuwanci
commercialCeilingFans.description: Magiya bayan rufi na DC marasa goge masu nauyi da aka ƙera don aikace-aikacen kasuwanci da masana'antu. Ingantaccen gini mai girma mai ƙarfin iska, tsawaita rayuwar aiki, da rage buƙatun kulawa.

exhaustFanMotors.title: Injinan Fan ɗin Shayewa
exhaustFanMotors.description: Injinan DC marasa goge masu inganci don aikace-aikacen fan ɗin shaye wa. An ƙera su don ci gaba da aiki tare da kyakkyawan sarrafa gudu, ƙananan matakan amo, da fifikon ingancin makamashi don tsarin samun iska.

coolerMotors.title: Injinan Sanyaya
coolerMotors.description: Injinan DC marasa goge masu amfani da makamashi don aikace-aikacen sanyaya iska. Yana fasalta sarrafa saurin gudu, aiki mai shiru, da amintaccen aiki na musamman don tsarin sanyaya na gida da na kasuwanci.

ventilationMotors.title: Injinan Samun Iska
ventilationMotors.description: Injinan DC marasa goge masu ci gaba don tsarin samun iska tare da daidaitaccen sarrafa gudu da ƙarancin amfani da wuta. Manhaja mai kyau don aikace-aikacen HVAC da ke buƙatar aiki mai shiru da ingancin makamashi.

submersiblePumps.title: Famfunan Da Ke Nutsewa
submersiblePumps.description: Famfunan DC marasa goge da ke nutsewa masu amfani da makamashi don aikace-aikacen samar da ruwa. Suna fasalta ginin da ke hana lalata, aikin saurin gudu, da inganci na musamman don borewell da zurfin famfo na ruwa.

surfacePumps.title: Famfunan Sama
surfacePumps.description: Famfunan DC marasa goge masu inganci don canja wurin ruwa da aikace-aikacen haɓaka matsa lamba. Ingantacciyar ƙira tare da fasalolin sarrafa hankali da fifikon tanadin makamashi idan aka kwatanta da famfunan gargajiya.

hybridPumps.title: Famfunan Haɗaka
hybridPumps.description: Famfunan DC masu haɗaka marasa goge da ke daidaitawa waɗanda suka dace da aikace-aikacen da ke nutsewa da na sama. Fasahar mota mai ci gaba tare da tsarin sarrafa daidaitawa don ingantaccen aiki a cikin nau'ikan yanayin aiki.

tableFanMotors.title: Injinan Fan ɗin Tebur
tableFanMotors.description: Ingantattun injinan DC marasa goge don aikace-aikacen fan ɗin tebur tare da kyakkyawan sarrafa gudu da aikin shiru. Ƙirar da ke amfani da makamashi tare da tsawaita rayuwar aiki da ƙarancin buƙatun kulawa.

wallFanMotors.title: Injinan Fan ɗin Bango
wallFanMotors.description: Injinan DC marasa goge da ke adana sarari don aikace-aikacen fan ɗin da aka ɗora a bango. Suna fasalta dacewa da sarrafa nesa, saitunan saurin gudu da yawa, da aiki mai amfani da makamashi don amfanin zama da kasuwanci.

pedestalFanMotors.title: Injinan Fan ɗin Pedestal
pedestalFanMotors.description: Injinan DC marasa goge masu ƙarfi don aikace-aikacen fan ɗin pedestal tare da daidaitaccen tsayi da fasalolin oscillation. Suna ba da fifikon iska mai ƙarfi tare da aiki mai amfani da makamashi da aikin shiru.

vfd.title: Variable Frequency Drives (VFD)
vfd.description: VFDs masu ci gaba don daidaitaccen sarrafa saurin mota da tanadin makamashi. Siffofin sun haɗa da ginanniyar kariya, nau'ikan sarrafawa da yawa, da hanyoyin sadarwa don haɗawa da tsarin sarrafa kansa.

softStarter.title: Masu fara laushi
softStarter.description: Masu fara laushi don sauƙaƙan hanzari da deceleration, rage damuwa na inji da hawan lantarki. Manhaja ce mai kyau don famfo, magoya baya, conveyors, da aikace-aikacen compressor da ke buƙatar farawa mai sarrafawa.

dolStarter.title: DOL Starters (Direct On Line)
dolStarter.description: Ƙarfin farawa motar kai tsaye don sarrafa motar mai sauƙi da amintacce. Ya haɗa da contactors, relays masu yawa, da da'irori masu sarrafawa don cikakken ƙarfin lantarki na injinan AC.

powerContactors.title: Contactors na Wuta
powerContactors.description: Contactors na electromagnetic masu nauyi don sauya injinan da juriya. Akwai su a cikin nau'ikan darajar yanzu tare da lambobin taimako da zaɓuɓɓukan haɗin inji don amintaccen aiki.

timerRelays.title: Lokaci Relays
timerRelays.description: Relays masu tsara lokaci don aikace-aikacen sarrafa jinkiri na lokaci. Nau'ikan ayyukan lokaci da yawa gami da jinkiri, kashe jinkiri, tazara, da lokacin bugun jini tare da daidaitawar dijital ko analog.

controlTransformers.title: Sarrafa Masu Sauyawa
controlTransformers.description: Saukar da masu sauyawa masu sarrafawa don panel da da'irori masu sarrafa inji. Akwai su a cikin ƙimar 1kVA, 3kVA, da 5kVA tare da kariyar fis ta farko da ta biyu don amintaccen sauya wuta.

streetLights.title: Fitilun Titi
streetLights.description: Fitilun titi na LED masu ƙima na masana'antu don hanyoyi, filayen ajiye motoci, da wuraren waje. Zane mai amfani da makamashi tare da fitarwa mai haske mai girma, tsawon rai, da kyakkyawan fassarar launi don haɓaka ganuwa da aminci.

streetLightsFlameproof.title: Fitilun Titi (Ba sa ɗaukar wuta)
streetLightsFlameproof.description: ATEX/IECEx ta tabbatar da fitilun titi na LED masu hana wuta don wurare masu haɗari na waje. Gina mai hana fashewa wanda ya cika buƙatun Zone 1 da Zone 2 tare da ƙaƙƙarfan gidaje don aiki mai aminci a cikin yanayi mai yuwuwar fashewa.

streetLightsWeatherproof.title: Fitilun Titi (Masu jure yanayi)
streetLightsWeatherproof.description: IP65/IP66 mai ƙima na fitilun titi na LED masu jure yanayi don mawuyacin yanayi na waje. Gine-gine masu jure lalata tare da babban danshi da kariyar ƙura don aiki mai aminci a cikin dukkan yanayin yanayi.

highBayLights.title: Fitilun Babban Bay
highBayLights.description: Fitilun LED masu fitarwa mai girma don manyan ɗakunan ajiya, masana'antu, da wuraren masana'antu. Yana ba da haske mai ƙarfi daga tsayin mita 6-15 tare da inganci mai kyau da ƙarancin haske don ingantattun yanayin aiki.

highBayLightsFlameproof.title: Fitilun Babban Bay (Ba sa ɗaukar wuta)
highBayLightsFlameproof.description: Fitilun LED masu hana fashewa don wurare masu haɗari na masana'antu. ATEX/IECEx ta tabbatar da aikace-aikacen Zone 1 da Zone 2 tare da rufin da ba ya ɗaukar wuta yana tabbatar da aiki mai aminci a cikin yanayin gas mai fashewa.

highBayLightsWeatherproof.title: Fitilun Babban Bay (Masu jure yanayi)
highBayLightsWeatherproof.description: IP65/IP66 mai ƙima na fitilun LED masu jure yanayi don wuraren masana'antu masu jika da ƙura. Gine-gine da aka rufe yana hana danshi da shigar ƙwayoyin cuta don amintaccen aiki a cikin mawuyacin yanayi.

vesselLights.title: Fitilun Jirgin Ruwa
vesselLights.description: Fitilun jirgin ruwa na LED na musamman don aikace-aikacen tanki na ruwa da na masana'antu. Ƙirar ɗa'a tare da ingantattun optics da ƙaƙƙarfan gini don haskaka tankuna, jiragen ruwa, da wurare masu iyakacin sarari.

vesselLightsFlameproof.title: Fitilun Jirgin Ruwa (Ba sa ɗaukar wuta)
vesselLightsFlameproof.description: Fitilun jirgin ruwa na LED masu hana fashewa don aikace-aikacen tanki da jirgin ruwa masu haɗari. An tabbatar da shi don yanayin Zone 1/2 mai fashewa tare da gidaje masu hana wuta suna tabbatar da aiki mai aminci a kusa da ruwa da gas mai ƙonewa.

vesselLightsWeatherproof.title: Fitilun Jirgin Ruwa (Masu jure yanayi)
vesselLightsWeatherproof.description: IP66/IP67 mai ƙima na fitilun jirgin ruwa na LED masu jure yanayi don hasken tanki na waje da wuraren jika. Gina da aka rufe tare da kayan aiki masu jure lalata don yanayin sarrafa ruwa da sinadarai.

floodLights.title: Fitilun Ambaliya
floodLights.description: Fitilun ambaliya na LED masu ƙarfi don hasken wuri da aikace-aikacen tsaro. Faɗin kusurwar katako tare da daidaitattun braket ɗin hawa yana ba da haske mai kama da juna don filayen wasanni, facades na gini, da manyan wuraren waje.

floodLightsFlameproof.title: Fitilun Ambaliya (Ba sa ɗaukar wuta)
floodLightsFlameproof.description: Fitilun ambaliya na LED masu hana fashewa don hasken wuri mai haɗari. ATEX/IECEx ta tabbatar da ginin da ba ya ɗaukar wuta don aiki mai aminci a cikin Zone 1 da Zone 2 mai yuwuwar yanayi mai fashewa.

floodLightsWeatherproof.title: Fitilun Ambaliya (Masu jure yanayi)
floodLightsWeatherproof.description: IP65/IP66 mai ƙima na fitilun ambaliya na LED masu jure yanayi don tsaro na waje da hasken wuri. Ƙaƙƙarfan gidaje na aluminum tare da gilashin zafin jiki da babban rufewa don aiki mai aminci a cikin matsanancin yanayin yanayi.

wellGlassLights.title: Fitilun Gilashin Rijiya
wellGlassLights.description: Fitilun LED na gilashin masana'antu don rufin da aka sake ginawa da hawa bango. Ƙaƙƙarfan murfin gilashi tare da ginin da ke jure zafi yana ba da haske mai inganci na gaba ɗaya don hanyoyin shiga, manyan ɗakunan ajiya, da wuraren masana'antu.

wellGlassLightsFlameproof.title: Fitilun Gilashin Rijiya (Ba sa ɗaukar wuta)
wellGlassLightsFlameproof.description: Fitilun LED na gilashin rijiya masu hana fashewa don wurare masu haɗari na cikin gida. ATEX/IECEx ta tabbatar da ginin da ba ya ɗaukar wuta tare da ƙarfafa murfin gilashin rijiya don aiki mai aminci a cikin wuraren da aka rarraba Zone 1 da Zone 2.

wellGlassLightsWeatherproof.title: Fitilun Gilashin Rijiya (Masu jure yanayi)
wellGlassLightsWeatherproof.description: IP65/IP66 mai ƙima na fitilun LED na gilashin rijiya masu jure yanayi don aikace-aikacen waje da wuraren jika. Gina da aka rufe tare da gilashin da ke jure tasiri da rufewar gasket don amintaccen aiki a cikin yanayi masu wahala.

digitalMotorProtectionRelay.title: Digital Motor Protection Relay (C&S)
digitalMotorProtectionRelay.description: Relay ɗin kariyar mota mai sarrafa microprocessor tare da cikakkun ayyukan kariya. Suna sa ido kan yanzu, ƙarfin lantarki, zafin jiki, da sigogin wuta tare da saitunan da za a iya tsara su da iyawar sadarwa.

voltageMonitoringRelay.title: Relay ɗin Sa ido kan Ƙarfin Lantarki
voltageMonitoringRelay.description: Relay ɗin sa ido kan ƙarfin lantarki mai matakai uku don kariya daga sama/ƙarƙashin ƙarfin lantarki, gazawar mataki, da kurakuran jerin matakai. Daidaitaccen matakan tafiya tare da saitunan jinkirin lokaci don kariya mai mahimmanci.

currentTransformers.title: Masu Sauya Yanzu (CT)
currentTransformers.description: Masu sauya yanzu don aikace-aikacen auna da kariya. Akwai su a cikin nau'ikan rabo tare da aji 0.5 da 1.0 daidaito don ma'auni, da 5P/10P aji don da'irori masu kariya.

potentialTransformers.title: Masu Sauya Ƙarfi (PT)
potentialTransformers.description: Masu sauya ƙarfi mai girma don auna ƙarfin lantarki da kariya. Ya dace da auna, relaying, da kayan aiki tare da kyakkyawan layi da ƙaramin matakin juyawa.

analogAmmeters.title: Analog Ammeters
analogAmmeters.description: Kayan auna panel na analog mai motsi/ƙarfe don auna yanzu. Akwai su a cikin nau'ikan kewayo tare da bayyanannun ma'auni da aka kammala karatu don ma'aunin kai tsaye ko na CT a cikin bangarori masu sarrafawa.

analogVoltmeters.title: Analog Voltmeters
analogVoltmeters.description: Madaidaicin voltmeters panel analog don ma'aunin ƙarfin lantarki na AC/DC. Ingantaccen gini tare da madubin anti-parallax da nau'ikan ƙarfin lantarki da yawa don daidaitaccen sa ido na gani.

digitalAmmeters.title: Digital Ammeters
digitalAmmeters.description: LED/LCD digital panel ammeters tare da babban daidaito da ƙuduri. Siffofin sun haɗa da kewayon auto, riƙe kololuwa, da hanyoyin sadarwa na zaɓi don tsarin sarrafawa na zamani.

digitalVoltmeters.title: Digital Voltmeters
digitalVoltmeters.description: Voltmeters panel digital don daidaitaccen ma'aunin ƙarfin lantarki na AC/DC. Manyan nunin LED/LCD tare da ƙararrawa masu tsara shirye-shirye da iyawar shigar da bayanai don sa ido kan tsari.

powerFactorMeters.title: Mitar Factor na Wuta
powerFactorMeters.description: Analog da digital power factor meters don sa ido kan ƙarfin amsawa. Muhimmin abu don gudanar da ingancin wuta tare da nuna alamar gani na jagora, lagging, da haɗin kan wuta.

hrcFuses.title: HRC Fuses (Babban Ƙarfin Rushewa)
hrcFuses.description: Babban fuses na karya don kariyar gajerun da'irori a cikin tsarin rarraba wuta. Akwai su a cikin nau'ikan darajar yanzu tare da ginin jiki na yumbu da lambobin azurfa.

motorTerminalBlocks.title: Motar Terminal Blocks
motorTerminalBlocks.description: Ingantattun tashoshi da aka ƙera don haɗin mota a cikin bangarori masu sarrafawa. Babban ƙarfin yanzu tare da ingantaccen gini don amintaccen wayar taransfoma mai matakai uku.

earthingStrips.title: Earthing Strips (Tagulla/Aluminum)
earthingStrips.description: Tagulla da aluminum earthing strips don tsarin gina lantarki. Akwai a cikin girman 25x3mm, 25x6mm, 50x6mm, da 75x10mm don ƙarancin juriya na ƙasa.

lightningArrestors.title: Lightning Arrestors
lightningArrestors.description: Na'urorin kariya na hawan igiyar ruwa don walƙiya da kariyar hawan igiyar ruwa. Nau'ikan da yawa gami da rarraba aji, aji na tashoshi, da masu kama da polymer don cikakkiyar kariyar ƙarfin lantarki.

multiFunctionMeters.title: Mitar Ayyuka Da yawa
multiFunctionMeters.description: Mitar sigogi masu ci gaba da yawa suna auna ƙarfin lantarki, yanzu, wuta, makamashi, factor wuta, da harmonics. Suna fasalta shigar da bayanai, fitarwar ƙararrawa, da sadarwa ta Modbus don cikakken sa ido kan wutar lantarki.

powerCables.title: Cables na Wuta
powerCables.description: Cables na wuta masu inganci don tsarin rarraba wutar lantarki. Akwai a cikin nau'ikan masu girman jagora da nau'ikan rufi don ƙarancin ƙarfi, matsakaici, da manyan aikace-aikacen ƙarfin lantarki tare da fifikon kaddarorin lantarki da inji.

controlCables.title: Cables na Sarrafawa
controlCables.description: Cables masu sarrafawa masu yawa don sarrafa kansa da aikace-aikacen kayan aiki. Suna fasalta kyakkyawan kaddarorin lantarki, kariyar tsangwama ta lantarki, da ingantaccen gini don wayoyi da tsarin sarrafawa.

armouredCables.title: Cables masu sulke
armouredCables.description: Cables masu sulke masu nauyi tare da waya ta ƙarfe ko sulke don kariya ta inji. Manhaja don shigarwar ƙarƙashin ƙasa, mahalli na masana'antu, da wuraren da ke buƙatar kariya daga lalacewa ta zahiri da beraye.

flexibleCables.title: Cables masu sassauƙa
flexibleCables.description: Cables masu sassauƙa da aka ƙera don ci gaba da aikace-aikacen motsi. Ya dace da sarƙoƙin kebul, robotics, da kayan aikin hannu tare da kyakkyawan radius na lanƙwasa da juriya na gajiya.

homeApplianceCables.title: Cables na Kayan Aikin Gida
homeApplianceCables.description: Cables na musamman don kayan aikin gida da na kasuwanci. Gina mai jure zafi da kuma hana wuta wanda ya cika ƙa'idodin aminci don firiji, injin wanki, murhu, da sauran kayan aikin lantarki.

multicoreCablesElectrical.title: Cables masu yawa (Lantarki)
multicoreCablesElectrical.description: Cables na lantarki masu yawa don aikace-aikacen wuta da sarrafawa. Akwai a cikin 2, 3, 4, da ƙarin cores tare da PVC ko XLPE rufi don ingantaccen wayoyi a cikin shigarwar masana'antu da na kasuwanci.

earthingCables.title: Cables na Ƙasa
earthingCables.description: Cables na ƙasa na jan ƙarfe don aikace-aikacen ƙasa da haɗin gwiwa. Akwai a cikin girma dabam dabam (6mm², 10mm², 16mm², 25mm², 35mm², 50mm²) don amincin lantarki da tsarin kariyar walƙiya.

ethernetCables.title: Cables na Ethernet
ethernetCables.description: Cables na Ethernet na masana'antu don cibiyoyin sadarwa na sarrafa kansa. Cat5e, Cat6, da Cat6a ƙayyadaddun bayanai tare da haɓaka kariya don mawuyacin yanayi na masana'antu da amintaccen watsawar bayanai mai sauri.

profibusCables.title: Cables na Profibus
profibusCables.description: Profibus-DP da Profibus-PA fieldbus cables don sarrafa kansa na masana'antu. Gina ma'aurata mai kariya mai kariya tare da daidaitawar impedance na halayya don amintaccen sadarwa a cikin cibiyoyin sadarwa na sarrafa tsari.

profinetCables.title: Cables na Profinet
profinetCables.description: Cables na Profinet Ethernet na masana'antu don sarrafa kansa na ainihi. Cat5e da Cat6 ƙayyadaddun bayanai tare da haɓaka kariyar EMC, ƙirar sassauƙa, da ginin da ba shi da halogen don aikace-aikacen Masana'antu 4.0.

shieldedPairCables1P.title: Cables masu kariya (1P)
shieldedPairCables1P.description: Cables masu kariya guda ɗaya don siginonin analog. Foil ɗin mutum ɗaya ko kariya mai kariya wanda ke ba da kyakkyawan rigakafin amo don 4-20mA da aikace-aikacen firikwensin ƙarancin ƙarfi.

shieldedPairCables2P.title: Cables masu kariya (2P)
shieldedPairCables2P.description: Cables masu kariya biyu don watsa sigina da yawa. Kowace ma'aurata tana da kariya daban-daban tare da allon gabaɗaya don iyakar kariya ta amo a cikin tsarin sarrafa tsari.

shieldedPairCables8P.title: Cables masu kariya (8P)
shieldedPairCables8P.description: Cables masu kariya takwas don aikace-aikace masu tashoshi da yawa. Ma'aurata masu kariya daban-daban tare da tantance launi don hadaddun tsarin sarrafawa da sa ido.

multicoreCablesInstrumentation.title: Cables masu yawa (Kayan aiki)
multicoreCablesInstrumentation.description: Cables na kayan aiki masu yawa tare da ma'aurata masu kariya da yawa. Akwai a cikin 4, 8, 12, 16, da 24-biyu configurations don rarraba tsarin sarrafawa da ma'auni masu yawa.

terminalBlocks.title: Toshewar Tashoshi
terminalBlocks.description: Amintattun tubalan tashoshi don haɗin lantarki a cikin bangarori masu sarrafawa da akwatunan mahaɗa. DIN rail mounting tare da dunƙule, bazara, da fasahohin haɗin shigar ciki don amintaccen wayoyi marasa kulawa.

electricalConnectors.title: Masu Haɗin Lantarki
electricalConnectors.description: Masu haɗin lantarki na masana'antu don aikace-aikacen wuta da sigina. Gina mai ƙarfi tare da kariyar IP-rated, daidaitawar lambobi da yawa, da amintaccen aiki a cikin mawuyacin yanayi.

industrialPlugs.title: Filogin Masana'antu
industrialPlugs.description: Filogi da soket na masana'antu masu nauyi don kayan aikin lantarki na hannu da na tsaye. Zane mai hana yanayi tare da coding na inji, tsare-tsaren aminci, da babban ƙarfin ɗaukar kaya don aikace-aikacen masana'antu.

miniatureCircuitBreakers.title: Ƙananan Masu Karya Kewaye (MCBs)
miniatureCircuitBreakers.description: Masu karya kewayawa masu ɗa'a don kariyar wuce gona da iri da guntu a cikin gidaje da aikace-aikacen kasuwanci masu sauƙi. Akwai a cikin nau'ikan ƙimar yanzu da halayen tafiya tare da amintaccen aikin thermal-magnetic.

moldedCaseBreakers.title: Masu Karya Shari'ar da Aka Ƙera (MCCBs)
moldedCaseBreakers.description: Masu karya shari'ar da aka ƙera masu nauyi don rarraba wutar lantarki ta masana'antu da kasuwanci. Babban ƙarfin karya tare da daidaitattun saitunan kariya da raka'o'in tafiya na lantarki na zaɓi don haɓaka kariya.

fusesFusesHolders.title: Fiyus da Masu Rike Fiyus
fusesFusesHolders.description: Fiyus na lantarki da masu riƙe fiyus don kariyar wuce gona da iri a cikin aikace-aikace daban-daban. Akwai a cikin harsashi, ruwa, da nau'ikan na musamman tare da halaye daban-daban na lokaci-yanzu da ƙarfin karya.

rccbCircuitBreakers.title: Masu Karya Kewayawa na Yanzu (RCCBs)
rccbCircuitBreakers.description: Masu karya kewayawa na ɗigar ƙasa suna ba da kariya daga girgizar lantarki da haɗarin gobara ta hanyar kurakurai na ƙasa. Akwai a cikin saiti mai sanduna 2 da sanduna 4 tare da nau'ikan ƙimar hankali daban-daban don haɓaka amincin lantarki.

acbCircuitBreakers.title: Masu Karya Kewayawa na Iska (ACBs)
acbCircuitBreakers.description: Masu karya kewayawa na iska mai ƙarfi don matsakaici da manyan tsarin rarraba wutar lantarki. Yana fasalta ayyukan kariya na ci gaba, iyawar aiki mai nisa, da kyakkyawan ƙarfin karya don aikace-aikacen masana'antu da amfani.

vcbCircuitBreakers.title: Masu Karya Kewayawa na Vacuum (VCBs)
vcbCircuitBreakers.description: Masu karya kewayawa na vacuum na ci gaba don aikace-aikacen matsakaicin ƙarfin lantarki tare da ingantacciyar fasahar kashe arc. Aikin da ba shi da kulawa tare da kyakkyawan juriya na lantarki da amintacce ga hanyoyin sadarwa na rarraba wuta.

acDcConverters.title: Masu Canza AC-DC
acDcConverters.description: Canza kayayyaki masu sauyawa don canza babban ƙarfin lantarki na AC zuwa tsayayyen fitarwa na DC. Ƙirar inganci mai girma tare da zaɓuɓɓukan fitarwa da yawa, kariyar ƙarfin lantarki, da faɗin kewayon ƙarfin shigarwa don aikace-aikacen masana'antu.

dcDcConverters.title: Masu Canza DC-DC
dcDcConverters.description: Masu canza DC-DC da aka keɓe da waɗanda ba a keɓe ba don canza ƙarfin lantarki a cikin tsarin lantarki. Ƙirar ɗa'a tare da babban inganci, ƙaramin ripple, da nau'ikan haɗakarwar ƙarfin shigarwa/fitarwa daban-daban don aikace-aikace masu buƙata.

upsSystems.title: Tsarin UPS
upsSystems.description: Tsarin samar da wutar lantarki marar katsewa don mahimman kariyar kayan aiki. Online, line-interactive, da tsarin jiran aiki tare da ajiyar baturi, daidaita wuta, da iyawar gudanar da hanyar sadarwa don ci gaban kasuwanci.

electricalCabinets.title: Kabinonin Lantarki
electricalCabinets.description: Kabinonin lantarki masu ƙarfi da rufaffiyar wurare don kayan aikin sarrafawa da abubuwan lantarki. Akwai a cikin kayan aiki daban-daban da ƙimar IP tare da ƙirar ɗa'a don sauƙin shigarwa da kulawa.

junctionBoxes.title: Akwatunan Junction
junctionBoxes.description: Akwatunan mahaɗa masu hana yanayi don haɗin lantarki da ƙarewar kebul. Zaɓuɓɓukan shigarwa da yawa tare da kayan aiki daban-daban da ƙimar kariyar muhalli don shigarwa na cikin gida da waje.

dinRailEnclosures.title: Rufaffiyar Rail DIN
dinRailEnclosures.description: Rufaffiyar Rail DIN mai ɗa'a don kayan aikin sarrafa kansa da na'urorin sarrafawa. Gina filastik da ƙarfe tare da ƙirar kamawa don sauƙin haɗuwa da ƙwararrun haɗin panel.

heatingCoils.title: Coils na dumama
heatingCoils.description: Coils na dumama masana'antu don aikace-aikacen dumama tsari. Akwai a cikin daidaitawa daban-daban ciki har da finned, harsashi, da hita band tare da daidaitaccen sarrafa zafin jiki da babban ingancin thermal.

heatingElements.title: Abubuwan Dumama
heatingElements.description: Abubuwan dumama lantarki don aikace-aikacen masana'antu da kasuwanci. Tubular, yumbu, da sassauƙa ƙira tare da nau'ikan watt daban-daban da kayan mayafi don ingantaccen canja wurin zafi da karko.

industrialHeaters.title: Masu Dumama Masana'antu
industrialHeaters.description: Masu dumama masana'antu masu nauyi don aikace-aikacen tsari ciki har da nutsewa, zagayawa, da masu dumama radiant. An ƙera su don mawuyacin yanayi tare da zaɓuɓɓukan hana fashewa da ingantaccen sarrafa zafin jiki.

digitalMultimeters.title: Multimeters na Dijital
digitalMultimeters.description: Madaidaicin multimita na dijital don ma'aunin lantarki ciki har da ƙarfin lantarki, yanzu, juriya, da mita. Ƙarfin RMS na gaskiya tare da shigar da bayanai, haɗin kwamfuta, da ayyukan aunawa na ci gaba.

clampMeters.title: Mita Clamp
clampMeters.description: Mita clamp na ma'aunin yanzu mara lamba don matsalar lantarki da kulawa. Ma'aunin yanzu na AC/DC tare da ƙarfin lantarki, juriya, da ma'aunin wuta a cikin ƙirar hannu mai ɗaukuwa.

benchMultimeters.title: Multimeters na Benci
benchMultimeters.description: Babban madaidaicin multimita na benci don aikace-aikacen dakin gwaje-gwaje da daidaitawa. Ingantacciyar daidaito da ƙuduri tare da hanyoyin sadarwa na kwamfuta, ayyukan ƙididdiga, da iyawar aunawa ta atomatik.

earthResistanceTesters.title: Masu Gwajin Juriya na Duniya
earthResistanceTesters.description: Ƙwararrun masu gwajin juriya na ƙasa don tabbatar da amincin lantarki da gwajin tsarin ƙasa. Samfuran ci-gaba suna fasalta gwajin da ba a buƙata, hanyoyin faɗuwar ƙarfin sanduna 3 da 4, ma'aunin juriya na ƙasa, da sarrafa mitar atomatik don rage tsangwama. Muhimmi ga tabbatar da amincin ƙasa ta lantarki, tsarin kariyar walƙiya, da tabbatar da bin ƙa'idodin aminci a cikin masana'antu, kasuwanci, da shigar amfani.

phaseSequenceCheckers.title: Masu Binciken Jerin Lokaci
phaseSequenceCheckers.description: Alamomin jujjuyawar lokaci da masu gwada jerin lokaci don tabbatar da tsarin lantarki mai matakai uku. Mahimman kayan aiki don tabbatar da daidaitaccen jujjuyawar lokaci kafin fara mota, hana lalacewar kayan aiki daga jujjuyawar baya. Akwai a cikin ƙira na lamba da waɗanda ba na lamba ba tare da alamun LED, iyawar aunawa na ƙarfin lantarki, da ginin da aka ƙima na aminci. Siffofin sun haɗa da alamar jerin lokaci na gani, tabbatar da jujjuyawar mota, ma'aunin mitar, da haɗin wayar hannu don takardu da rahoto.

digitalMegohmmeters.title: Megohmmeters na Dijital
digitalMegohmmeters.description: Masu gwajin juriya na rufewa mai ƙarfin lantarki (megohmmeters) don cikakken gwajin rufewar lantarki da kulawa na rigakafi. Ƙwararrun kayan aiki suna ba da ƙarfin gwaji daga 50V zuwa 15kV don igiyoyi, motoci, transfoma, da gwajin kayan sauyawa. Siffofin sun haɗa da Gwajin Ƙididdigar Ƙarfin Wuta (PI) da Dielectric Absorption Ratio (DAR), gano da'irar rayuwa, gwajin mataki na ƙarfin lantarki, aiki mai nisa, shigar da bayanai tare da lokaci/tambarin kwanan wata, da haɗin PC. Muhimmi ga gwajin mota mai bin IEEE 43-2000 da tabbatar da amincin lantarki.

milliampereSourceMeters.title: Mita Source Milliampere
milliampereSourceMeters.description: Madaidaicin calibrators na madauki na milliampere da mita tushen yanzu don gwaji da daidaitawar madauki na sarrafa tsari na 4-20mA. Ƙwararrun kayan aiki suna ba da daidaitaccen tushen mA da ma'auni tare da ginanniyar samar da wutar lantarki madauki 24V don kwaikwayon mai watsawa mai waya 2. Siffofin sun haɗa da iyawar tushen lokaci ɗaya da aunawa, ayyukan mataki na atomatik don gwajin layi, daidaitawar sadarwa ta HART, ayyukan rampa don gwajin bawul, da ƙirar kamawa waɗanda ke kawar da karyewar madauki. Muhimmi ga gyara matsala da daidaita kayan aikin tsari a cikin tsarin sarrafa kansa na masana'antu.

realTimeAnalyzers.title: Masu Nazari na Ainihi
realTimeAnalyzers.description: Masu nazarin sigina na ainihi don ci gaba da kulawa da kamawa na wucin gadi. 100% yiwuwar shiga tsakani tare da haɓaka jawo hankali da iyawar hankali ta sigina.

powerMeters.title: Mita Wuta
powerMeters.description: Mita wuta mai daidaito don ma'aunin wutar lantarki da bincike. Ƙarfin matakai da yawa tare da cikakkun sigogin wuta ciki har da ma'aunin wuta mai aiki, mai amsawa, da bayyane.

harmonicAnalyzers.title: Masu Nazarin Harmonic
harmonicAnalyzers.description: Masu nazarin harmonic na ci gaba don kimanta ingancin wuta da gwajin bin IEEE 519. Binciken harmonic na ainihi har zuwa tsari na 50 tare da cikakkun iyawar rahoto.

energyLoggers.title: Masu Shigar da Makamashi
energyLoggers.description: Masu shigar da bayanan makamashi masu tashoshi da yawa don sa ido kan amfani da wutar lantarki na dogon lokaci da gudanar da makamashi. Sadarwar mara waya tare da haɗin girgije da fasalulluka na rahoto ta atomatik.

calibrationInstruments.title: Kayan aikin Daidaitawa
calibrationInstruments.description: Madaidaicin kayan aikin daidaitawa don daidaitawar lantarki, zafin jiki, matsa lamba, da sigogin tsari. Daidaiton da za a iya gano shi ta NIST tare da hanyoyin daidaitawa ta atomatik da takardu.

testEquipment.title: Kayan Gwaji
testEquipment.description: Kayan gwaji da aunawa na janar-manufa don dakin gwaje-gwaje da aikace-aikacen filin. Kayan aiki masu dacewa don gwajin lantarki, lantarki, da inji tare da daidaitawar ɗaukuwa da kan tebur.

processCalibrators.title: Masu Daidaita Tsari
processCalibrators.description: Masu daidaita tsari masu aiki da yawa don cikakken filin da daidaitawar kayan aikin tsari. Yana fasalta matsa lamba, zafin jiki, da daidaitawar siginar lantarki tare da sadarwa ta HART, shigar da bayanai, da hanyoyin atomatik don haɓaka ingancin daidaitawa.

loopCalibrators.title: Masu Daidaita Madauki
loopCalibrators.description: Madaidaicin calibrators na madauki na mA don gwaji da gyara madaukai na yanzu na 4-20mA da tsarin sarrafa tsari. Kayan aikin hannu suna ba da ƙarfin madauki, ma'aunin yanzu, da kwaikwayo na sigina don cikakken bincike na madauki a cikin yanayin filin da bita.

hartCalibrators.title: Masu Daidaita HART
hartCalibrators.description: Advanced HART filin calibrators da masu sadarwa don cikakken daidaitawar kayan aikin tsari da daidaitawa. Yana fasalta ginanniyar goyon bayan yarjejeniyar sadarwa ta HART, waɗannan na'urori masu aiki da yawa sun haɗu da matsa lamba, zafin jiki, da daidaitawar siginar lantarki tare da iyawar sadarwa ta dijital ta HART. Goyon baya ga nau'ikan HART 5-7, umarni na duniya da na na'ura, takaddun atomatik, da haɗin kai mara kyau tare da na'urorin filin wayo don ingantaccen daidaitawar filin da gudanar da na'ura.

mechanicalTools.title: Kayan Aikin Inji
mechanicalTools.description: Ƙwararrun kayan aikin hannu na inji don haɗuwa, kulawa, da ayyukan gyara. Gina ƙarfe mai inganci tare da ƙirar ergonomic don aikace-aikacen masana'antu da na kera motoci.

electricalTools.title: Kayan Aikin Lantarki
electricalTools.description: Kayan aikin lantarki da aka keɓe don amintaccen aiki akan da'irori masu rai da shigarwar lantarki. VDE ta tabbatar da ƙimar kariyar ƙarfin lantarki mai girma da riƙewa na ergonomic don amincin ma'aikacin lantarki.

precisionTools.title: Kayan Aiki Masu Daidaito
precisionTools.description: Madaidaicin ma'auni da kayan aikin injiniya don aikace-aikacen mahimmanci na daidaito. Kayan aiki da aka daidaita tare da ƙayyadaddun haƙuri don sarrafa inganci da ƙera daidaito.

electricDrills.title: Injinan Lantarki
electricDrills.description: Injinan lantarki masu nauyi don hakowa, tuƙi, da aikace-aikacen ɗaurewa. Sarrafa saurin gudu tare da chucks marasa maɓalli da manyan motocin juyi don ƙwararrun gini da amfani da masana'antu.

angleGrinders.title: Injinan Angle
angleGrinders.description: Injinan angle masu nauyi don aikace-aikacen yankan, niƙa, da goge. Motoci masu ƙarfi tare da masu gadi na aminci da tsarin hana girgiza don tsawaita aiki a cikin yanayin masana'antu.

impactDrivers.title: Direbobin Tasiri
impactDrivers.description: Manyan direbobin tasiri don aikace-aikacen ɗaurewa masu nauyi. Motocin da ba a goge ba tare da sarrafa saurin gudu da hasken LED don daidaitaccen tuƙi a cikin gini da aikin haɗuwa.

weldingMachines.title: Injinan Walda
weldingMachines.description: Injinan walda na ƙwararru don MIG, TIG, Stick, da aikace-aikacen walda masu yawa. Fasaha mai ci gaba tare da daidaitaccen sarrafa arc, ƙarfin lantarki biyu, da ginin ƙarfi don ƙera masana'antu, kulawa, da aikin gyara. Siffofin sun haɗa da nunin dijital, iyawar bugun jini, da saitin atomatik don ingantaccen ingancin walda.

cuttingBlades.title: Ruwan Yankan
cuttingBlades.description: Ruwan yankan ƙima don aikace-aikacen ƙarfe, itace, da masonry. Zaɓuɓɓukan da aka yi amfani da carbide da diamond-coated tare da ingantattun geometry na hakori don yanke mai tsabta da tsawaita rayuwar ruwa.

drillBits.title: Ƙananan Hakowa
drillBits.description: Ƙananan hakowa masu aiki da yawa don karfe, bakin karfe, da kayan aiki masu wuya. Gina cobalt da carbide tare da ƙwararrun coatings don ingantaccen aikin hakowa da tsawaita rayuwar kayan aiki.

millingCutters.title: Masu Yankan Nika
millingCutters.description: Madaidaicin masu yankan injiniya don CNC da ayyukan injiniya na hannu. Ƙarfe mai ƙarfi da ginin HSS tare da daidaitawar flute daban-daban don ingantaccen cire kayan aiki da ƙarewar saman.

chopSaws.title: Saws Chop (Saws ɗin Yanke)
chopSaws.description: Yankan ƙarfe mai ƙima mai nauyi yana yanke saws don ƙera masana'antu da aikin ƙarfe. Yana fasalta fasahar yankan sanyi na TCT (Tungsten Carbide Tipped) don yanke mai tsabta, mara burr tare da ƙarancin zafi da tartsatsi. Akwai a cikin samfuran 14" da 15" tare da manyan motocin juyi, vises masu saurin sakewa, da iyawar miter don yanke kusurwa. Yana yanke ƙarfe, bakin karfe, aluminum, da sauran karafa da sauri fiye da bandsaws tare da ƙarewa mai shirye don walda.

chainHoists.title: Hoists Chain
chainHoists.description: Manyan hoists na sarkar don aikace-aikacen ɗagawa a tsaye a cikin yanayin masana'antu da gini. Samfuran hannu da na lantarki tare da kariyar wuce gona da iri da iyawar matsayi na kaya daidai.

wireRopeHoists.title: Wire Rope Hoists
wireRopeHoists.description: Babban hoists na igiya don ayyukan ɗagawa masu nauyi da tsarin sarrafa kayan aiki. Aikin lantarki tare da sarrafa saurin gudu da fasalulluka na aminci na ci gaba don aikace-aikace masu buƙata.

safetyHarnesses.title: Harnesses na Tsaro
safetyHarnesses.description: Harnesses na tsaro na jiki don kariyar faɗuwa a cikin yanayin aiki mai girma. Shimfidar wuri mai daɗi tare da maki haɗe da yawa da buckles masu saurin haɗawa don amincin ma'aikata.

safetyBarriers.title: Shingayen Tsaro
safetyBarriers.description: Shingayen tsaro na masana'antu da masu gadi don kariyar haɗarin wurin aiki da sarrafa kewaye. Zane mai ɗa'a tare da launuka masu ganuwa da ginin juriya mai tasiri don amincin masu tafiya da kayan aiki.

emergencyEquipment.title: Kayan Aikin Gaggawa
emergencyEquipment.description: Mahimman kayan aikin mayar da martani na gaggawa ciki har da tashoshin wanke ido, shawa na aminci, kayan agaji na farko, da tsarin sadarwa na gaggawa. ANSI Z358.1 mai bi tare da zaɓuɓɓukan da ke tattare da kai da na plumbed.

monocrystallinePanels.title: Kwangwalolin Rana na Monocrystalline
monocrystallinePanels.description: Kwangwalolin hasken rana na monocrystalline masu inganci tare da ingantaccen fitarwa na wuta da amfani da sarari. Ƙimar sel na silicon tare da shafi mai hana haske da ƙwararrun firam ɗin aluminum don shigarwar zama da kasuwanci.

polycrystallinePanels.title: Kwangwalolin Rana na Polycrystalline
polycrystallinePanels.description: Kwangwalolin hasken rana na polycrystalline masu tsada suna ba da amintaccen aiki da ƙima mai kyau don shigarwa mai girma. Gina mai ɗorewa tare da kyakkyawan coefficient na zafin jiki da amintaccen amintaccen lokaci mai tsawo.

thinFilmPanels.title: Kwangwalolin Rana na Thin Film
thinFilmPanels.description: Kwangwalolin hasken rana masu sassauƙa tare da amorphous silicon da fasahar CIGS don aikace-aikace na musamman. Ƙirar nauyi mai sauƙi tare da ingantaccen aikin haske mai ƙarancin haske da zaɓuɓɓukan haɗin gwiwa masu kyau.

stringInverters.title: Inverters String
stringInverters.description: Inverters string masu inganci don tsarin PV na hasken rana tare da matsakaicin bin diddigin wutar lantarki da cikakkun iyawar kulawa. Ƙirar ƙarfi tare da faɗin kewayon ƙarfin shigarwa da aikin haɗin grid.

microInverters.title: Micro Inverters
microInverters.description: Micro inverters na matakin module don matsakaicin girbin makamashi da kulawa da panel ɗin mutum. Gaggauta rufewa mai bi tare da haɓaka fasalulluka na aminci da sauƙaƙan hanyoyin shigarwa.

powerOptimizers.title: Masu Inganta Wuta
powerOptimizers.description: Masu inganta wutar lantarki ta DC don haɓaka aikin tsarin hasken rana tare da MPPT na matakin module da kulawa. Yana rage asarar shading da rashin daidaituwa yayin da yake kula da tattalin arziƙin inverter string.

modularPlcs.title: PLCs Modular
modularPlcs.description: PLCs mai ɗa'a mai girma don hadaddun tsarin sarrafa kansa. Faɗaɗɗen daidaitawar I/O tare da iyawar sadarwa na ci gaba da sarrafa sauri don aikace-aikacen sarrafa masana'antu.

compactPlcs.title: PLCs ɗin ɗa'a
compactPlcs.description: Masu kula da ma'ana mai shirye-shirye masu ɗa'a don ƙananan matsakaita zuwa aikace-aikacen sarrafa kansa. Haɗe-haɗen I/O tare da ginanniyar hanyoyin sadarwa da software na shirye-shirye mai sauƙin amfani.

microPlcs.title: Micro PLCs
microPlcs.description: Masu kula da ma'ana mai shirye-shirye na Ultra-compact micro don ayyuka masu sauƙin sarrafa kansa. Magani mai tsada tare da mahimman iyawar I/O da ayyukan sadarwa na asali don ƙaramin sarrafa inji.

scadaSoftware.title: Software na SCADA
scadaSoftware.description: Cikakken kulawa da kulawa da software na samun bayanai don sa ido kan tsarin masana'antu da sarrafawa. Hoton bayanai na ainihi tare da gudanar da ƙararrawa da iyawar bin diddigin tarihi.

scadaHardware.title: Kayan aikin SCADA
scadaHardware.description: Kayan aikin SCADA mai ƙima na masana'antu don amintaccen samun bayanai da ayyukan sarrafawa. Gina mai ƙarfi tare da hanyoyin sadarwa masu yawa da abubuwan da za a iya musanyawa da zafi don iyakar lokacin aiki.

scadaGateways.title: Ƙofofin SCADA
scadaGateways.description: Ƙofofin juyawa na yarjejeniya don haɗin tsarin SCADA da dacewa da dillalai da yawa. Yana goyan bayan yarjejeniyar sadarwa ta masana'antu da yawa tare da amintaccen watsa bayanai da aikin ainihi.

dcsControllers.title: Masu Kula da DCS
dcsControllers.description: Masu kula da tsarin sarrafa rarraba don babban sarrafa tsari da tsarin aminci. Gine-gine mai yawa tare da ƙirar samuwa mai girma da algorithms na sarrafa tsari mai ci gaba.

dcsOperatorStations.title: Tashoshin Ma'aikata na DCS
dcsOperatorStations.description: Tashoshin aiki na ci gaba don sa ido kan tsarin sarrafa rarraba da aiki. Iyawar nuni da yawa tare da zane-zane masu sauƙi da cikakken gudanarwa na ƙararrawa.

dcsEngineeringStations.title: Tashoshin Injiniya na DCS
dcsEngineeringStations.description: Tashoshin injiniya don daidaitawa, shirye-shirye, da kiyayewa na DCS. Cikakken yanayin haɓaka tare da iyawar kwaikwayo da sarrafa sigar.

touchscreenHmis.title: HMIs na Fuskar Taɓawa
touchscreenHmis.description: Fuskar taɓawa ta injin-mutum na masana'antu don sarrafa ma'aikata da sa ido. Nunin taɓawa da yawa tare da ƙaƙƙarfan gini don mawuyacin yanayi.

panelMountHmis.title: HMIs Dutsen Panel
panelMountHmis.description: Haɗin hulɗar injin-mutum da aka ɗora a panel cikin kabad ɗin sarrafawa da bangarori masu aiki. Ƙirar ɗa'a tare da dorewa mai ƙima na masana'antu.

mobileHmis.title: HMIs na Wayar hannu
mobileHmis.description: Hanyoyin hulɗar injin-mutum masu ɗaukar nauyi don sarrafa ma'aikata ta hannu da sa ido na filin. Zane mai ƙarfi tare da haɗin mara waya da tsawon rayuwar baturi.

safetyRelays.title: Relays na Tsaro
safetyRelays.description: Relays na aminci don inji da tsarin kariyar ma'aikata. An tabbatar da aikace-aikacen aminci tare da aikin hana kasawa da iyawar bincike.

emergencyStops.title: Tashin Gaggawa
emergencyStops.description: Na'urorin tsayawa na gaggawa don rufe injinan nan da nan. Gina mai ƙarfi tare da lambobin buɗewa masu kyau da bayyananniyar alamar gani.

safetySwitches.title: Sauya Tsaro
safetySwitches.description: Matsayin sa ido kan sauya aminci don ƙofofin gadi da bangarori masu shiga. Zane mai hana kutse tare da masu kunnawa da aka sanya lambar don iyakar tsaro.

explosionProofEquipment.title: Kayan Aiki Mai Hana Fashewa
explosionProofEquipment.description: Kayan aikin lantarki mai hana fashewa da aka tabbatar don shigarwa mai haɗari. An tsara shi don hana kunna gas mai ƙonewa da tururi tare da kewayon ƙaƙƙarfan da ke saduwa da ƙa'idodin aminci na duniya.

intrinsicallySafeBarriers.title: Shinge Masu Tsaro na Cikin Gida
intrinsicallySafeBarriers.description: Shinge na aminci don da'irori masu aminci a cikin wurare masu haɗari. Yana ba da iyaka mai ƙarfi da keɓewar galvanic don hana tushen wuta a cikin yanayin fashewa.

isFieldDevices.title: Na'urorin Filin Tsaro na Cikin Gida
isFieldDevices.description: Na'urorin filin da aka tabbatar don aikin tsaro na asali a cikin yanayin fashewa. Ya haɗa da na'urori masu auna firikwensin, masu watsawa, da masu kunnawa waɗanda aka tsara don aikace-aikacen yanki 0/1 masu haɗari.

acSurgeProtectors.title: Masu Kariyar AC Surge
acSurgeProtectors.description: Na'urorin kariya na AC power line surge don kariyar kayan aikin lantarki. Kariyar matakai da yawa akan walƙiya, sauya surges, da damuwa na layin wuta a cikin shigarwar masana'antu.

dcSurgeProtectors.title: Masu Kariyar DC Surge
dcSurgeProtectors.description: Na'urorin kariya na DC kewaye don kayan aikin lantarki masu mahimmanci. Kariyar ƙwararru don tsarin wutar lantarki na DC, shigarwar hasken rana, da aikace-aikacen da ke amfani da baturi.

signalSurgeProtectors.title: Masu Kariyar Sigina Surge
signalSurgeProtectors.description: Kariyar layin sigina don bayanai da da'irori na sadarwa. Yana kare siginoni na analog da dijital, hanyoyin sadarwa na filin bas, da da'irori na kayan aiki daga tsangwama na lantarki.

equipmentGrounding.title: Tsarin Ƙasa na Kayan Aiki
equipmentGrounding.description: Abubuwan da ke tattare da ƙasa don amincin kayan aikin lantarki da kariya. Sandunan ƙasa na jan ƙarfe da ƙarfe, masu gudanarwa, da kayan haɗi don dacewa da ƙasa tsarin lantarki.

systemGrounding.title: Hanyoyin Magance Ƙasa na Tsarin
systemGrounding.description: Cikakkun hanyoyin magance tsarin ƙasa don wuraren masana'antu. Grid ɗin ƙasa, lantarki, da tsarin sa ido don amincin tsarin wutar lantarki da dacewa ta lantarki.

lightningProtection.title: Tsarin Kariyar Walƙiya
lightningProtection.description: Tsarin kariya na walƙiya don gine-gine da gine-gine na masana'antu. Tashoshin iska, masu gudanarwa, da masu kama da surge waɗanda aka tsara zuwa ƙa'idodin IEC 62305 don cikakkiyar kariyar walƙiya.

singleStageCentrifugal.title: Famfunan Centrifugal Mataki ɗaya
singleStageCentrifugal.description: Famfunan centrifugal mataki ɗaya na kwance da tsaye don samar da ruwa da aikace-aikacen masana'antu. Aiki mai inganci tare da ƙarancin buƙatun kulawa don yanayin gudun ruwa da kai daban-daban.

multiStageCentrifugal.title: Famfunan Centrifugal Matakai Da yawa
multiStageCentrifugal.description: Famfunan centrifugal matakai da yawa masu matsa lamba don aikace-aikace masu buƙata. Masu tura da yawa suna ba da damar kai mai girma don haɓaka matsa lamba, jujjuyawar osmosis, da aikace-aikacen tsarin masana'antu.

verticalCentrifugal.title: Famfunan Centrifugal Tsaye
verticalCentrifugal.description: Famfunan centrifugal tsaye masu adana sarari don shigarwa mai iyaka. Ya dace da ramuka, tankuna, da aikace-aikace inda sararin kwance ya iyakance yayin kiyaye aikin inganci mai girma.

airOperatedDiaphragm.title: Famfunan Diaphragm da Ake Aiki da Iska
airOperatedDiaphragm.description: Famfunan diaphragm na pneumatic don sarrafa ruwa mai tsauri da mai danko. Aikin ɗaukar kai tare da kyawawan iyawar tsotsa don sarrafa sinadarai da aikace-aikacen ruwa mai sharar gida.

electricDiaphragm.title: Famfunan Diaphragm na Lantarki
electricDiaphragm.description: Famfunan diaphragm da ake tuƙi da lantarki don daidaitaccen sashi da aikace-aikacen aunawa. Sauya sarrafa gudun ruwa tare da kyakkyawan dacewa na sinadarai don kula da ruwa da tsarin allurar sinadarai.

hydraulicDiaphragm.title: Famfunan Diaphragm na Hydraulic
hydraulicDiaphragm.description: Famfunan diaphragm da aka kunna ta hanyar Hydraulic don aikace-aikace masu girma. Daidaitaccen sarrafa gudun ruwa da kyawawan maimaitawa don sashi na sinadarai da tsarin tsaftacewa mai girma.

externalGearPumps.title: Famfunan Gear na Waje
externalGearPumps.description: Tabbatattun famfunan gear na waje don canja wurin ruwa mai danko. Isar da gudun ruwa mai daidaituwa ba tare da la'akari da bambancin matsa lamba ba, manufa don mai mai lubricating da ruwan hydraulic.

internalGearPumps.title: Famfunan Gear na Ciki
internalGearPumps.description: Famfunan gear na ciki tare da siffofi masu santsi don ruwa mai mahimmanci. Ƙananan ƙirar bugun jini ta dace da sarrafa abinci, magunguna, da aikace-aikacen sinadarai waɗanda ke buƙatar kulawa mai kyau.

magneticGearPumps.title: Famfunan Gear na Magnetic Drive
magneticGearPumps.description: Famfunan gear da aka haɗa ta hanyar Magnetic don aikin da ba shi da ɗigo. Zane da aka rufe Hermetically yana kawar da hatimin shaft, cikakke don sinadarai masu haɗari da aikace-aikace masu tsabta.

impellersCasings.title: Masu tura da Casings
impellersCasings.description: Masu tura da casings na famfo don famfunan centrifugal. Akwai a cikin kayan daban-daban ciki har da simintin ƙarfe, bakin karfe, da gami na musamman don aikace-aikace da kafofin watsa labarai daban-daban.

sealsGaskets.title: Hatimi da Gaskets
sealsGaskets.description: Hatimin famfo da gaskets don amintaccen hana ɗigo. Hatimin inji, O-rings, da saitin gasket a cikin kayan daban-daban don dacewa da yanayin zafi daban-daban, matsa lamba, da buƙatun dacewa ta sinadarai.

bearingsCouplings.title: Bearings da Haɗin gwiwa
bearingsCouplings.description: Bearings famfo da haɗin gwiwa masu sassauƙa don tsarin tuƙi na inji. Babban ingancin abubuwan da ke tattare da tsawaita rayuwar sabis, rage girgiza, da amintaccen watsa wutar lantarki a cikin aikace-aikacen famfo.

jibCranes.title: Jib Cranes
jibCranes.description: Jib cranes na masana'antu don sarrafa kayan aiki da aikace-aikacen ɗagawa. Yana fasalta ƙaƙƙarfan gini, juyawa mai santsi, da zaɓuɓɓukan hawa masu sassauƙa don tarurruka da wuraren samarwa.

personalProtectiveEquipment.title: Kayan Kariya na Kai
personalProtectiveEquipment.description: Kayan aikin tsaro na masana'antu ciki har da hular kwano, safar hannu, gilashin aminci, da tufafin kariya. Kayan aiki da aka tabbatar sun sadu da ƙa'idodin aminci na duniya don kariyar ma'aikata a cikin mahalli na masana'antu.

messages.noProductsInGroup: Ba a sami kayayyaki a cikin wannan rukunin ba.
messages.noProductGroups: Babu rukunin samfura da ke akwai a cikin wannan nau'in.
